articles.title: Hagfish genome elucidates vertebrate whole-genome duplication events and their evolutionary consequences - Nature.com
articles.description: Analysis of a newly sequenced genome of the inshore hagfish, Eptatretus burgeri, together with genomes of lampreys and jawed vertebrates, provides insights into whole-genome duplication events and their implications for vertebrate genome evolution.
